name: reactive-highlights
description: This extension highlights Angular Signals and Vue.js references in another color than the rest of the code to ensure readability throughout the code and make the reactive contexts obvious to see.

reactiveHighlights.color.description: The text color for reactive variables (e.g., #A020F0, purple, rgb(160, 32, 240)).

reactiveHighlights.enableBackground.description: Enable background highlighting for reactive variables.

reactiveHighlights.backgroundColor.description: The background color for reactive variables (if enabled).

reactiveHighlights.enableBold.description: Enable bold text for reactive variables.

reactiveHighlights.enableItalic.description: Enable italic text for reactive variables.

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
